name: Trucking Mewsday #jinglecats2020
description:
Like trucking tuesday? like Jinglecats? Of course you do!

Would you like them together? No. But we did it anyway.

Controls:

WASD to control, Left click to honk, SHIFT to boost, R to respawn.

Goal:

The kitties have lost their instruments, now they won't be able to perform at the Christmas concert! save all five instruments to save Christmas.
